Question: This person was elected Governor of Arkansas in 1978, having defeated the Republican candidate Lynn Lowe, a farmer from Texarkana.
Hints: At the 2012 Democratic National Convention, this person gave a widely praised speech nominating Barack Obama.
The ____ administration also launched the first official White House website, whitehouse.gov, on October 21, 1994.
During ****'s term, Arkansas performed its first executions since 1964 (the death penalty had been re-enacted on March 23, 1973).
